Package com.compendium.core.datamodel.services

Interface Summary
IClientService The interface for the ClientService class The ClientService class provides remote services to manipuate code objects.
ICodeGroupService The interface for the CodeGroupService class The CodeGroupService class provides services to manipuate code group data in the database.
ICodeService The interface for the CodeService class The CodeService class provides remote services to manipuate code objects in the database.
IExternalConnectionService The interface for the ExternalConnectionService class The ExternalConnection service class provides services to manipuate ExternalConnection objects in the Connections table.
IFavoriteService The interface for the FavoriteService class The Favorite service class provides remote services to manipuate Favorite data in the database.
IGroupCodeService The interface for the GroupCodeService class The GroupCode service class provides remote services to manipuate GroupCode records in the database.
ILinkService The interface for the LinkService class The LinkService class provides services to manipuate Link record data in the database.
IMeetingService The interface for the MeetingService class The MeetingService service class provides services to manipuate records in the MediaIndex and Meeting table.
INodeService The interface for the NodeService class The node service class provides remote services to manipuate node objects.
IQueryService The interface for the QueryService class The QueryService class provides services to run general node search queries of the database.
IService The interface for the Service class, which is the base class for all Service classes.
IServiceManager The interface for the CodeService class The code service class provides remote services to manipuate code objects.
ISystemService The interface for the SystemService class.
IUserService The interface for the UserService class The code service class provides remote services to manipuate code objects.
IViewLayerService The interface for the ViewLayerService class The ViewLayer service class provides remote services to manipuate ViewLayer data.
IViewPropertyService The interface for the ViewPropertyService class The ViewProperty service class provides remote services to manipuate View Property data.
IViewService The interface for the ViewService class The ViewService class provides services to manipuate view objects in the database.
IWorkspaceService The interface for the WorkspaceService class The Workspace service class provides remote services to manipuate Workspace data.
 

Class Summary
ClientService The ClientService class extends Service and is itself extended by all other service classes.
CodeGroupService The CodeGroupService class provides services to manipuate code group data in the database.
CodeService The CodeService class provides remote services to manipuate code objects in the database.
ExternalConnectionService The ExternalConnectionService class for interacting with the Database layer.
FavoriteService The Favorite service class provides remote services to manipuate Favorite data in the database.
GroupCodeService The GroupCode service class provides remote services to manipuate GroupCode records in the database.
LinkService The LinkService class provides services to manipuate Link record data in the database.
MeetingService The MeetingService class for interacting with the Database layer.
NodeService The interface for the NodeService class The NodeService class provides services to manipuate NodeSummary record data in the database.
QueryService The QueryService class provides services to run general node search queries of the database.
Service The base class for all Service classes.
ServiceCache This object store a particular set of services being used in the curernt session.
ServiceManager The ServiceManager class, manages the Services which are used to access talk to the database.
SystemService The interface for the SystemService class The system service class provides remote services to manipuate systemdata.
UserService The interface for the UserService class The user service class provides remote services to manipuate user objects.
UserSessionCache This object store a particular set of users against their sessions
ViewLayerService The interface for the ViewLayerService class The ViewLayer service class provides services to manipuate ViewLayer objects.
ViewPropertyService The interface for the ViewPropertyService class The ViewProperty service class provides services to manipuate ViewProperty objects.
ViewService The ViewService class provides services to manipuate view objects in the database.
WorkspaceService The interface for the WorkspaceService class The Workspace service class provides remote services to manipuate Workspace objects.
